snippet: A soldier accused of taking explosives into Midland International Airport in his carry-on bag may have flown halfway across the country with them the week before.
abstract: Trey Scott Atwater, soldier accused of taking explosives into Midland International Airport in his carry-on bag, may have flown halfway across the country with them the week before; he is charged with trying to take explosives onto an airplane.
lead_paragraph: A soldier accused of taking explosives into Midland International Airport in his carry-on bag may have flown halfway across the country with them the week before.

headline.main: Texas: Soldier May Have Taken Explosives on Plane
headline.print_headline: Texas: Soldier May Have Taken Explosives On Plane
